module.name: requirement_decomposition
module.keywords: module, requirement, structure, decomposition, combinatorial, dependencies, inspection, production

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the structure of a requirement, including any explicit combinatorial relationship between requirements helping to compose a requirement, and any dependencies upon other requirements.

inscope.li: generic categories for enterprise classification of requirements;
items within the scope of application module Conductivity material aspects, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1756;
items within the scope of application module Elemental geometric shape, ISO/TS 10303-1004;
items within the scope of application module Functional specification, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1679;
items within the scope of application module Product rule, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1739.
